title: Why are champions allowed to get pentas by only pressing R?

replies.body:
Come on at least try
If ill presses r nothing happens unless She follows up with other stuff
At least mention kat when you make such a silly complaint
Any player with a brain can CC {{champion:55}} and shes useless.

Wait, so CC'ing the teleporting temptress is easy, but the giant one that has to lumber up to you slowly(anything is slow compared to instant) is _hard_? What. 
http://grabilla.com/06619-53d06ce0-949d-46e8-8539-6088bbc36b7e.png

Im not complaiming about kat or saying shes op
But OP said press r to win and thats exactly what kats R tries to do
You really love to farm those dislikes dont ya?

Why are some champions allowed to get pentas by only right clicking?
Why are some champions allowed to get pentas by only pressing Q?
Why are some champions allowed to get pentas by only pressing W?
Why are some champions allowed to get pentas by only pressing E?

There's always more too it than "only".
I once got a penta kill by pressing R on zilean

lol

They are impactful but not really just pentakill with just R.

I can't believe you didn't put {{champion:122}} .  Unlike those 3 who have to use other abilities darius can actually pretty easily just get a penta with aas and R.
{{champion:122}} at least takes a little effort. Cant believe Im defending Darius, but at least he has to attack you a few times and keep you in range, not to mention R is only single target.

Your post and points made afterwards are so full of contradictions, it is making me sick. Two juggernauts and a mage? HARD, OP, IMPOSSIBLE TO DEAL WITH. Another juggernaut and an _assassin who can get to you, kill you, and escape in a blink of an eye(NOT TO MENTION SHE CAN JUST PRESS R AND KILL YOUR ENTIRE TEAM IF YOU DON'T STOP HER, LIKE EVERYONE ELSE YOU ARE COMPLAINING ABOUT)_? So easy, anyone with brain cells can stop them. 

Seriously, do you forget what your previous points were every time you write a response? Because that is the only way I can reconcile this many contradictions.

Work on your complaint posts, You picked 3 of the least complained about champs (- Illiaoi)  Why no Katarina, Why no Leblanc, Yasuo, Master Yi, Warwick, Vi.. If you're gunna complain, complain about broken champs lol

Why are champions allowed to get a penta without moving?

{{champion:17}}

> [{quoted}](name=ShinkoMinori,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=HfRVRjnJ,comment-id=0009,timestamp=2016-06-25T01:43:14.492+0000)
>
> Why are champions allowed to get a penta without moving?
> 
> {{champion:17}}

Funny thing is I'm starting to main him

> [{quoted}](name=ShinkoMinori,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=HfRVRjnJ,comment-id=0009,timestamp=2016-06-25T01:43:14.492+0000)
>
> Why are champions allowed to get a penta without moving?
> 
> {{champion:17}}

Omfg so true
In most cases those champs can't get pentas just by pressing R.

Because:

{{champion:420}} Her ult is stuck in one place and, due to her inability to lock you down, is incredibly easy to just walk out of.
{{champion:85}} If he's building enough damage for this ult to be killing entire teams, he's also presumably hyper squishy. Given how face deep in the enemy team he has to be to be hitting everybody while this squishy, quite frankly he deserves the penta if you do absolutely nothing to stop him.
{{champion:62}} A more extreme case of Kennen, mostly.

> [{quoted}](name=TehNACHO,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=HfRVRjnJ,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-06-25T01:20:07.863+0000)
>
> Because:
> 
> {{champion:420}} Her ult is stuck in one place and, due to her inability to lock you down, is incredibly easy to just walk out of.
> {{champion:85}} If he's building enough damage for this ult to be killing entire teams, he's also presumably hyper squishy. Given how face deep in the enemy team he has to be to be hitting everybody while this squishy, quite frankly he deserves the penta if you do absolutely nothing to stop him.
> {{champion:62}} A more extreme case of Kennen, mostly.

Yeah and honestly full ad Wukong is a MAJOR noob trap. So this will happen more often than not.

Instantly. 

God are you the same guy in the other thread that doesn't apparently know what Illaoi actually does?

He still needs to have gotten in position between 5 enemies. Kill his squishy ass before he reaches that point.

If your entire team got knocked up instantly, again, this is your team's fault for playing so poorly against Wukong of all champions.

{{champion:420}} I know what she does. She presses R and everyone dies. 

{{champion:85}} soooo hard to "get in position" when he zooms in at 800 movespeed that for some reason boosts his defense.

{{champion:62}} Yah its our fault we didnt CC and burst the tanky invisible monkey

Illaoi presses R, which causes tentacles to pop up and slam, then, in order to kill you, she needs to continue beating the crap out of you, which necessitates some right clicking, q'ing, e'ing, and most importantly, w'ing. Hardly a "just press R" champ. Even if she is ungodly fed and extremely squishy (because she built pure damage) I doubt that she can kill you instantly with just the one tentacle slam. And if she somehow can, you should be trying to stop her from getting their in the first place, _with cc_.  

Actually, this applies to all of these, which are meant to _punish_ grouping up. But, you know, just keep playing to their strengths and complain when you lose. That's the best course of action.
you forgot{{champion:63}} {{champion:55}} {{champion:11}} {{champion:9}}  and full app{{champion:32}}  and{{champion:20}} {{champion:3}}

{{champion:63}} has to push a lot of buttons, and doesnt get pentas.
{{champion:55}} any player with a brain knows how to CC Kat.
{{champion:11}} see Kat
{{champion:9}} too easily killed
{{champion:32}} {{champion:20}} {{champion:3}} and {{champion:54}} could have put these guys here but they dont usually build AP. So whatever

Brand: Can just press R _and walk away_. If he is fed enough, or if you have multiple high max health tanks, your team is going to die. I guess the tanks might survive, but not the squishies. And tanks cannot do much on their own, especially against a fed ap champ with his team intact.

Kat: See my other posts about the stupidity of this response.

Yi: See Kat
Fiddlesticks: Oh, so _Kennen_, who has the same mentality of "R in enemy team and use {{item:3157}}" is hard, despite that he has to use his e to get in. Which leaves him open to cc. While Fid can just use his R(and good luck cc'ing him if Fid is channeling from fog of war or a bush) but Fid is too easily killed. As I said before to your thoughts on Kat. _WHAT_.

Last 4: so people who cannot just R and kill your team, unless they built differently than they usually do, made it in, but people who _can_ if they build ap, but usually dont, didn't? Who taught you logic? I want to know so I can strangle them.
Why downvotes?
Missing Karthus, for one thing.
Cz unlike you, people know how to counter.
They always do this stupid "Why downvotes?" comment when the thread is so stupidly bad that not even a shit poster would call it a good shit post.

> [{quoted}](name=Caítlyn,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=HfRVRjnJ,comment-id=,timestamp=2016-06-25T01:17:01.696+0000)
>
> {{champion:420}} {{champion:85}} {{champion:62}} 
> 
> Why is this allowed?

I pressed R in fountain, why don't I have a penta yet
